original_title: When New York Was One: The Yankees, the Mets & The 2000 Subway Series
overview: A nostalgic look back on 2000 Subway Series through the lens of New York’s citizens – one year before the 9/11 tragedy – and highlights a community forever-changed in the 20 years since, all the way to its unique present-day climate.
title: When New York Was One: The Yankees, the Mets & The 2000 Subway Series
